Parameter.Label: Selective Reporting
Parameter.Help: Enable selective reporting only when power change reaches a certain threshold or percentage set in 4-11 below. This is used to reduce network traffic.

Parameter.Label: Current Threshold - Whole strip
Parameter.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Whole HEM). (Valid values 0-60000)

Parameter.Label: Current Threshold - Socket 1
Parameter.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 1). (Valid values 0-60000)

Parameter.Label: Current Threshold - Socket 2
Parameter.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 2). (Valid values 0-60000)

Parameter.Label: Current Threshold - Socket 3
Parameter.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 3). (Valid values 0-60000)

Parameter.Label: Current Threshold - Socket 4
Parameter.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 4). (Valid values 0-60000)

Parameter.Label: Current Threshold - Socket 5
Parameter.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 5). (Valid values 0-60000)

Parameter.Label: Current Threshold - Socket 6
Parameter.Help: Threshold change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 6). (Valid values 0-60000)

Parameter.Label: Percent Change - Whole Strip
Parameter.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Whole Smart Strip). (Valid values 0-100)

Parameter.Label: Percent Change - Socket 1
Parameter.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 1). (Valid values 0-100)

Parameter.Label: Percent Change - Socket 2
Parameter.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 2). (Valid values 0-100)

Parameter.Label: Percent Change - Socket 3
Parameter.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 3). (Valid values 0-100)

Parameter.Label: Percent Change - Socket 4
Parameter.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 4). (Valid values 0-100)

Parameter.Label: Percent Change - Socket 5
Parameter.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 5). (Valid values 0-100)

Parameter.Label: Percent Change - Socket 6
Parameter.Help: Percentage change in wattage to induce a automatic report (Socket 6). (Valid values 0-100)

Parameter.Label: Status of load changed
Parameter.Help: Status of load changed,send group 1 associate nodes Hail CC or Basic report CC.

Parameter.Label: Get Temperature
Parameter.Help: Get temperature of Smart Strip (Only GET is valid)

Parameter.Label: Which reports need to send automatically for Group 1
Which reports need to send automatically for Group 2
Which reports need to send automatically for Group 3
Interval to send out reports of Group 1
Interval in welchem die Berichte der Gruppe 1 gesendet werden
Interval to send out reports of Group 2
Interval in welchem die Berichte der Gruppe 2 gesendet werden
Interval to send out reports of Group 3
Interval in welchem die Berichte der Gruppe 3 gesendet werden
